thread.title: Dive into the best hot dogs from around our great nation (25 Photos)
thread.title_full: Dive into the best hot dogs from around our great nation (25 Photos)

author: Travis
title: Dive into the best hot dogs from around our great nation (25 Photos)
text:
Foursquare 
Everyone wants to know… is a hot dog a sandwich? According to Merriam-Webster , a sandwich is defined as “ a: two or more slices of bread or a split roll having a filling in between or b: one slice of bread covered with food.” 
Foursquare City Guide went through tons of user ratings to find the best hot dogs in the country. 
25. Vicious Dogs North Hollywood — North Hollywood, California 2 
24. Good Dog Houston — Houston, Texas 3 
23. Steve’s Hot Dogs On The Hill — St. Louis, Missouri 4 
22. Mustard’s Last Stand — Melbourne, Florida 5 
21. Crif Dogs — New York City, New York Advertisement
